backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence reports linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and base styles for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell with root div and module script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that renders the WorldTimeDashboard.
frontend/src/components/TimeZoneClockCar: Card showing time, date, UTC offset, and day/night status for a selected time zone with remove support.
frontend/src/components/TimeZoneSelector: Searchable selector for adding time zones, filtering out already-selected ones.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with query invalidation on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state restoration, and AuthClient setup.
Hook syncing state to localStorage with JSON serialization and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Hook returning a Date updated every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom chroma-gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/timezones.ts: Exports a TimeZoneInfo interface and a predefined list of common global time zones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/WorldTimeDashboard.ts: Implements the main dashboard UI for displaying, adding, and removing world time zone clocks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app's chroma theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, theme notes, and known issues for the world clock app.
